<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BitWidth == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.BitWidth &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Bit widths must be same for comparison&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5ed1d98c99f36cde30cb052c78fa5e35">isSingleWord</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t lhsSext = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad12a58d7f81a304e0c568ad2210bc4fe">SignExtend64</a>(U.VAL, BitWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t rhsSext = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad12a58d7f81a304e0c568ad2210bc4fe">SignExtend64</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.U.VAL, BitWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lhsSext &lt; rhsSext ? -1 : lhsSext &gt; rhsSext;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lhsNeg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> rhsNeg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.isNegative();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the sign bits don&#39;t match, then (LHS &lt; RHS) if LHS is negative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhsNeg != rhsNeg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lhsNeg ? -1 : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise we can just use an unsigned comparison, because even negative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// numbers compare correctly this way if both have the same signed-ness.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> APInt::setBitsSlowCase(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> loBit, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hiBit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> loWord = whichWord(loBit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hiWord = whichWord(hiBit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create an initial mask for the low word with zeros below loBit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t loMask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a> &lt;&lt; whichBit(loBit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If hiBit is not aligned, we need a high mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hiShiftAmt = whichBit(hiBit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (hiShiftAmt != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a high mask with zeros above hiBit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t hiMask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - hiShiftAmt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If loWord and hiWord are equal, then we combine the masks. Otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set the bits in hiWord.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (hiWord == loWord)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">      loMask &amp;= hiMask;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">      U.pVal&#91;hiWord&#93; |= hiMask;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply the mask to the low word.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  U.pVal&#91;loWord&#93; |= loMask;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fill any words between loWord and hiWord with all ones.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> word = loWord + 1; word &lt; hiWord; ++word)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    U.pVal&#91;word&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Complement a bignum in-place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340" lineLink="#a7b409aa866bfa91f29f51fd35bb56003"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a7b409aa866bfa91f29f51fd35bb56003">tcComplement</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">APInt::WordType</a> &#42;dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> parts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; parts; i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    dst&#91;i&#93; = ~dst&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Toggle every bit to its opposite value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> APInt::flipAllBitsSlowCase() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Concatenate the bits from &quot;NewLSB&quot; onto the bottom of &#42;this.  This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// equivalent to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   (this-&gt;zext(NewWidth) &lt;&lt; NewLSB.getBitWidth()) | NewLSB.zext(NewWidth)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In the slow case, we know the result is large.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> APInt::concatSlowCase(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;NewLSB)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewWidth = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>() + NewLSB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Toggle a given bit to its opposite value whose position is given</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af5f9dd7fb931d5c71749761348534109">setBitVal</a>(bitPosition, !(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)&#91;bitPosition&#93;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> subBitWidth = subBits.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insertion is a direct copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (subBitWidth == BitWidth) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> = subBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Single word result can be done as a direct bitmask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5ed1d98c99f36cde30cb052c78fa5e35">isSingleWord</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t mask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - subBitWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    U.VAL &amp;= ~(mask &lt;&lt; bitPosition);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    U.VAL |= (subBits.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab82287ee9a2442bc0b6025a9936c88dc">VAL</a> &lt;&lt; bitPosition);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> loBit = whichBit(bitPosition);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> loWord = whichWord(bitPosition);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hi1Word = whichWord(bitPosition + subBitWidth - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insertion within a single word can be done as a direct bitmask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (loWord == hi1Word) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t mask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - subBitWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">    U.pVal&#91;loWord&#93; &amp;= ~(mask &lt;&lt; loBit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    U.pVal&#91;loWord&#93; |= (subBits.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab82287ee9a2442bc0b6025a9936c88dc">VAL</a> &lt;&lt; loBit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert on word boundaries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (loBit == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Direct copy whole words.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> numWholeSubWords = subBitWidth / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(U.pVal + loWord, subBits.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ada7af1de63a848b2f452d63958de39fe">getRawData</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">           numWholeSubWords &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask+insert remaining bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> remainingBits = subBitWidth % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (remainingBits != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t mask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9312eb1fba50adaeda024f10b9919136">WORDTYPE&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - remainingBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">      U.pVal&#91;hi1Word&#93; &amp;= ~mask;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">      U.pVal&#91;hi1Word&#93; |= subBits.getWord(subBitWidth - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// General case - set/clear individual bits in dst based on src.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO - there is scope for optimization here, but at the moment this code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// path is barely used so prefer readability over performance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i != subBitWidth; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af5f9dd7fb931d5c71749761348534109">setBitVal</a>(bitPosition + i, subBits&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a369007fafbf2f88498f412f00eb0a469"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aabe301a4f18d38478700ad44ba2245bc">APInt::insertBits</a>(uint64&#95;t subBits, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> bitPosition, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> numBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t maskBits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a79dff91526e31b1a05f59eed6c189eb4">maskTrailingOnes&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(numBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  subBits &amp;= maskBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5ed1d98c99f36cde30cb052c78fa5e35">isSingleWord</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> loBit = whichBit(bitPosition);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> loWord = whichWord(bitPosition);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hiWord = whichWord(bitPosition + numBits - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (loWord == hiWord) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    U.pVal&#91;loWord&#93; |= subBits &lt;&lt; loBit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(8 &#42; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a>) &lt;= 64, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;This code assumes only two words affected&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> wordBits = 8 &#42; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extracting bits that start on a source word boundary can be done</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as a fast memory copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (loBit == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(numBits, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(U.pVal + loWord, 1 + hiWord - loWord));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// General case - shift + copy source words directly into place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> Result(numBits, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSrcWords = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t &#42;DestPtr = Result.isSingleWord() ? &amp;Result.U.VAL : Result.U.pVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> word = 0; word &lt; NumDstWords; ++word) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t w0 = U.pVal&#91;loWord + word&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t w1 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (loWord + word + 1) &lt; NumSrcWords ? U.pVal&#91;loWord + word + 1&#93; : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DestPtr&#91;word&#93; = (w0 &gt;&gt; loBit) | (w1 &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - loBit));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result.clearUnusedBits();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(bitPosition &lt; BitWidth &amp;&amp; (numBits + bitPosition) &lt;= BitWidth &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(numBits &lt;= 64 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Illegal bit extraction&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t maskBits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a79dff91526e31b1a05f59eed6c189eb4">maskTrailingOnes&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(numBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5ed1d98c99f36cde30cb052c78fa5e35">isSingleWord</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (U.VAL &gt;&gt; bitPosition) &amp; maskBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> &gt;= 64,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;This code assumes only two words affected&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> loBit = whichBit(bitPosition);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> loWord = whichWord(bitPosition);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hiWord = whichWord(bitPosition + numBits - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (loWord == hiWord)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (U.pVal&#91;loWord&#93; &gt;&gt; loBit) &amp; maskBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t retBits = U.pVal&#91;loWord&#93; &gt;&gt; loBit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  retBits |= U.pVal&#91;hiWord&#93; &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - loBit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  retBits &amp;= maskBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> retBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a31665d34f2904bf73a6dd6419dcd8587"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a31665d34f2904bf73a6dd6419dcd8587">APInt::getSufficientBitsNeeded</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Str, uint8&#95;t Radix) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Str.empty() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid string length&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StrLen = Str.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each computation below needs to know if it&#39;s negative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsNegative = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Str&#91;0&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;-&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> || Str&#91;0&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;+&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IsNegative = Str&#91;0&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;-&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StrLen--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StrLen &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;String is only a sign, needs a value.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For radixes of power-of-two values, the bits required is accurately and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// easily computed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Radix == 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StrLen + IsNegative;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Radix == 8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StrLen &#42; 3 + IsNegative;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Radix == 16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StrLen &#42; 4 + IsNegative;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute a sufficient number of bits that is always large enough but might</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be too large. This avoids the assertion in the constructor. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calculation doesn&#39;t work appropriately for the numbers 0-9, so just use 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits in that case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Radix == 10)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StrLen == 1 ? 4 : StrLen &#42; 64 / 18) + IsNegative;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Radix == 36);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StrLen == 1 ? 7 : StrLen &#42; 16 / 3) + IsNegative;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab9178a079b54667289f598db5b052ade"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab9178a079b54667289f598db5b052ade">APInt::getBitsNeeded</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> str, uint8&#95;t radix) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute a sufficient number of bits that is always large enough but might</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be too large.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> sufficient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a31665d34f2904bf73a6dd6419dcd8587">getSufficientBitsNeeded</a>(str, radix);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For bases 2, 8, and 16, the sufficient number of bits is exact and we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return the value directly. For bases 10 and 36, we need to do extra work.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (radix == 2 || radix == 8 || radix == 16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> sufficient;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is grossly inefficient but accurate. We could probably do something</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with a computation of roughly slen&#42;64/20 and then adjust by the value of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the first few digits. But, I&#39;m not sure how accurate that could be.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> slen = str.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each computation below needs to know if it&#39;s negative.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute how many bits are required. If the log is infinite, assume we need</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a> + log;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can check that all parts of an integer are equal by making use of a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#af122c2b921533dd3d3d3f0c0569b5624"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#af122c2b921533dd3d3d3f0c0569b5624">llvm::APIntOps::GreatestCommonDivisor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fast-path a common case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Corner cases: if either operand is zero, the other is the gcd.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Count common powers of 2 and remove all other powers of 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pow2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pow2&#95;A = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.countr&#95;zero();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pow2&#95;B = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.countr&#95;zero();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pow2&#95;A &gt; Pow2&#95;B) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.lshrInPlace(Pow2&#95;A - Pow2&#95;B);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Pow2 = Pow2&#95;B;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pow2&#95;B &gt; Pow2&#95;A) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.lshrInPlace(Pow2&#95;B - Pow2&#95;A);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Pow2 = Pow2&#95;A;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Pow2 = Pow2&#95;A;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Both operands are odd multiples of 2^Pow&#95;2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   gcd(a, b) = gcd(|a - b| / 2^i, min(a, b))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a modified version of Stein&#39;s algorithm, taking advantage of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// efficient countTrailingZeros().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.ugt(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> -= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.lshrInPlace(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.countr&#95;zero() - Pow2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> -= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.lshrInPlace(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.countr&#95;zero() - Pow2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#a9f1937c6b659f3758dae8adca513fcd2"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#a9f1937c6b659f3758dae8adca513fcd2">llvm::APIntOps::RoundDoubleToAPInt</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Double, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> width) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aab3863f16cb0767af49f0dd63bc5aa90">bit&#95;cast&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(Double);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the sign bit from the highest order bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &gt;&gt; 63;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the 11-bit exponent and adjust for the 1023 bit bias</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t exp = ((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &gt;&gt; 52) &amp; 0x7ff) - 1023;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the exponent is negative, the value is &lt; 0 so just return 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (exp &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(width, 0u);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extract the mantissa by clearing the top 12 bits (sign + exponent).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t mantissa = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &amp; (~0ULL &gt;&gt; 12)) | 1ULL &lt;&lt; 52;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the exponent doesn&#39;t shift all bits out of the mantissa</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (exp &lt; 52)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a> ? -<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(width, mantissa &gt;&gt; (52 - exp)) :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(width, mantissa &gt;&gt; (52 - exp));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the client didn&#39;t provide enough bits for us to shift the mantissa into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then the result is undefined, just return 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (width &lt;= exp - 52)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(width, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we have to shift the mantissa bits up to the right location</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Tmp(width, mantissa);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Tmp &lt;&lt;= (unsigned)exp - 52;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a> ? -Tmp : Tmp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function converts this APInt to a double.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The layout for double is as following (IEEE Standard 754):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  --------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// |  Sign    Exponent    Fraction    Bias |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// |-------------------------------------- |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// |  1&#91;63&#93;   11&#91;62-52&#93;   52&#91;51-00&#93;   1023 |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  --------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ae5dfa02c3403baa3d057b6264eed687d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a74c7bc4d4687802bcd1e3628fcbec03f">APInt::roundToDouble</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandlargedivrem-cpp/#a49b2092a066cfbc24bc6925bdea9682a">isSigned</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle the simple case where the value is contained in one uint64&#95;t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is wrong to optimize getWord(0) to VAL; there might be more than one word.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5ed1d98c99f36cde30cb052c78fa5e35">isSingleWord</a>() || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3015474e70e59c0a3ed4f9f0e8644b75">getActiveBits</a>() &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandlargedivrem-cpp/#a49b2092a066cfbc24bc6925bdea9682a">isSigned</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">      int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aca8fce65eb69a82aa10a635e2e79877a">sext</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad12a58d7f81a304e0c568ad2210bc4fe">SignExtend64</a>(getWord(0), BitWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> double(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aca8fce65eb69a82aa10a635e2e79877a">sext</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> double(getWord(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine if the value is negative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandlargedivrem-cpp/#a49b2092a066cfbc24bc6925bdea9682a">isSigned</a> ? (&#42;this)&#91;BitWidth-1&#93; : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Construct the absolute value if we&#39;re negative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a44d65323d90a63e5f572fe8f44db1154">APInt</a> Tmp(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a> ? -(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) : (&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Figure out how many bits we&#39;re using.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n = Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3015474e70e59c0a3ed4f9f0e8644b75">getActiveBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The exponent (without bias normalization) is just the number of bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we are using. Note that the sign bit is gone since we constructed the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// absolute value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t exp = n;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return infinity for exponent overflow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (exp &gt; 1023) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandlargedivrem-cpp/#a49b2092a066cfbc24bc6925bdea9682a">isSigned</a> || !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;double&gt;::infinity();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;double&gt;::infinity();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">  exp += 1023; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Increment for 1023 bias</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Number of bits in mantissa is 52 To obtain the mantissa value, we must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// extract the high 52 bits from the correct words in pVal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t mantissa;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hiWord = whichWord(n-1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (hiWord == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">    mantissa = Tmp.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a23b5d5d53d9a7a8d473b61cd78b1a543">pVal</a>&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (n &gt; 52)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">      mantissa &gt;&gt;= n - 52; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shift down, we want the top 52 bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(hiWord &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;huh?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t hibits = Tmp.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a23b5d5d53d9a7a8d473b61cd78b1a543">pVal</a>&#91;hiWord&#93; &lt;&lt; (52 - n % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t lobits = Tmp.U.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a23b5d5d53d9a7a8d473b61cd78b1a543">pVal</a>&#91;hiWord-1&#93; &gt;&gt; (11 + n % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">    mantissa = hibits | lobits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The leading bit of mantissa is implicit, so get rid of it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t sign = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a> ? (1ULL &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - 1)) : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = sign | (exp &lt;&lt; 52) | mantissa;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aab3863f16cb0767af49f0dd63bc5aa90">bit&#95;cast&lt;double&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Truncate to new width.</span></CodeLine>
