<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = n; i &gt; 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; v&#91;i - 1&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// D1. &#91;Normalize.&#93; Set d = b / (v&#91;n-1&#93; + 1) and multiply all the digits of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// u and v by d. Note that we have taken Knuth&#39;s advice here to use a power</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of 2 value for d such that d &#42; v&#91;n-1&#93; &gt;= b/2 (b is the base). A power of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 allows us to shift instead of multiply and it is easy to determine the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shift amount from the leading zeros.  We are basically normalizing the u</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and v so that its high bits are shifted to the top of v&#39;s range without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overflow. Note that this can require an extra word in u so that u must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be of length m+n+1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> shift = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>(v&#91;n - 1&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t v&#95;carry = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t u&#95;carry = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (shift) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; m+n; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t u&#95;tmp = u&#91;i&#93; &gt;&gt; (32 - shift);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><span class="doxyHighlight">      u&#91;i&#93; = (u&#91;i&#93; &lt;&lt; shift) | u&#95;carry;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><span class="doxyHighlight">      u&#95;carry = u&#95;tmp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; n; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t v&#95;tmp = v&#91;i&#93; &gt;&gt; (32 - shift);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><span class="doxyHighlight">      v&#91;i&#93; = (v&#91;i&#93; &lt;&lt; shift) | v&#95;carry;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><span class="doxyHighlight">      v&#95;carry = v&#95;tmp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  u&#91;m+n&#93; = u&#95;carry;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;KnuthDiv:   normal:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = m + n; i &gt;= 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; u&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; by&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = n; i &gt; 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; v&#91;i - 1&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// D2. &#91;Initialize j.&#93;  Set j to m. This is the loop counter over the places.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = m;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: quotient digit #&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; j &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// D3. &#91;Calculate q&#39;.&#93;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Set qp = (u&#91;j+n&#93;&#42;b + u&#91;j+n-1&#93;) / v&#91;n-1&#93;. (qp=qprime=q&#39;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Set rp = (u&#91;j+n&#93;&#42;b + u&#91;j+n-1&#93;) % v&#91;n-1&#93;. (rp=rprime=r&#39;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now test if qp == b or qp&#42;v&#91;n-2&#93; &gt; b&#42;rp + u&#91;j+n-2&#93;; if so, decrease</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// qp by 1, increase rp by v&#91;n-1&#93;, and repeat this test if rp &lt; b. The test</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on v&#91;n-2&#93; determines at high speed most of the cases in which the trial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value qp is one too large, and it eliminates all cases where qp is two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// too large.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t dividend = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af54e0572ecf26033ac3fe4513016dfbe">Make&#95;64</a>(u&#91;j+n&#93;, u&#91;j+n-1&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: dividend == &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; dividend &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t qp = dividend / v&#91;n-1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t rp = dividend % v&#91;n-1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (qp == b || qp&#42;v&#91;n-2&#93; &gt; b&#42;rp + u&#91;j+n-2&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      qp--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      rp += v&#91;n-1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (rp &lt; b &amp;&amp; (qp == b || qp&#42;v&#91;n-2&#93; &gt; b&#42;rp + u&#91;j+n-2&#93;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">        qp--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: qp == &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; qp &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, rp == &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; rp &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// D4. &#91;Multiply and subtract.&#93; Replace (u&#91;j+n&#93;u&#91;j+n-1&#93;...u&#91;j&#93;) with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (u&#91;j+n&#93;u&#91;j+n-1&#93;..u&#91;j&#93;) - qp &#42; (v&#91;n-1&#93;...v&#91;1&#93;v&#91;0&#93;). This computation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// consists of a simple multiplication by a one-place number, combined with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a subtraction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The digits (u&#91;j+n&#93;...u&#91;j&#93;) should be kept positive; if the result of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this step is actually negative, (u&#91;j+n&#93;...u&#91;j&#93;) should be left as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// true value plus b&#42;&#42;(n+1), namely as the b&#39;s complement of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the true value, and a &quot;borrow&quot; to the left should be remembered.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t borrow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; n; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t p = uint64&#95;t(qp) &#42; uint64&#95;t(v&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><span class="doxyHighlight">      int64&#95;t subres = int64&#95;t(u&#91;j+i&#93;) - borrow - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(p);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      u&#91;j+i&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(subres);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><span class="doxyHighlight">      borrow = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7b622c469acc130c9a500b85b1473ef3">Hi&#95;32</a>(p) - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7b622c469acc130c9a500b85b1473ef3">Hi&#95;32</a>(subres);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: u&#91;j+i&#93; = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; u&#91;j + i&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, borrow = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; borrow &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a> = u&#91;j+n&#93; &lt; borrow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    u&#91;j+n&#93; -= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(borrow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: after subtraction:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = m + n; i &gt;= 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; u&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// D5. &#91;Test remainder.&#93; Set q&#91;j&#93; = qp. If the result of step D4 was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// negative, go to step D6; otherwise go on to step D7.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    q&#91;j&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(qp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/complexdeinterleavingpass-cpp/#a2762113571c7956c9818c452b2d256ae">isNeg</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// D6. &#91;Add back&#93;. The probability that this step is necessary is very</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// small, on the order of only 2/b. Make sure that test data accounts for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this possibility. Decrease q&#91;j&#93; by 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><span class="doxyHighlight">      q&#91;j&#93;--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and add (0v&#91;n-1&#93;...v&#91;1&#93;v&#91;0&#93;) to (u&#91;j+n&#93;u&#91;j+n-1&#93;...u&#91;j+1&#93;u&#91;j&#93;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A carry will occur to the left of u&#91;j+n&#93;, and it should be ignored</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// since it cancels with the borrow that occurred in D4.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> carry = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint32&#95;t limit = std::min(u&#91;j+i&#93;,v&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlight">        u&#91;j+i&#93; += v&#91;i&#93; + carry;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><span class="doxyHighlight">        carry = u&#91;j+i&#93; &lt; limit || (carry &amp;&amp; u&#91;j+i&#93; == limit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><span class="doxyHighlight">      u&#91;j+n&#93; += carry;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: after correction:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = m + n; i &gt;= 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; u&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\nKnuthDiv: digit result = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; q&#91;j&#93; &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// D7. &#91;Loop on j.&#93;  Decrease j by one. Now if j &gt;= 0, go back to D3.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (--j &gt;= 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: quotient:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = m; i &gt;= 0; i--) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; q&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// D8. &#91;Unnormalize&#93;. Now q&#91;...&#93; is the desired quotient, and the desired</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remainder may be obtained by dividing u&#91;...&#93; by d. If r is non-null we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compute the remainder (urem uses this).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (r) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The value d is expressed by the &quot;shift&quot; value above since we avoided</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiplication by d by using a shift left. So, all we have to do is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shift right here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (shift) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t carry = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;KnuthDiv: remainder:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = n-1; i &gt;= 0; i--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlight">        r&#91;i&#93; = (u&#91;i&#93; &gt;&gt; shift) | carry;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><span class="doxyHighlight">        carry = u&#91;i&#93; &lt;&lt; (32 - shift);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; r&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = n-1; i &gt;= 0; i--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlight">        r&#91;i&#93; = u&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; r&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a853b1f403275dde6db4c3a0b7a799f8f">DEBUG&#95;KNUTH</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> APInt::divide(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WordType &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lhsWords, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WordType &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> rhsWords, WordType &#42;Quotient, WordType &#42;Remainder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(lhsWords &gt;= rhsWords &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Fractional result&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, compose the values into an array of 32-bit words instead of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 64-bit words. This is a necessity of both the &quot;short division&quot; algorithm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the Knuth &quot;classical algorithm&quot; which requires there to be native</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations for +, -, and &#42; on an m bit value with an m&#42;2 bit result. We</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can&#39;t use 64-bit operands here because we don&#39;t have native results of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 128-bits. Furthermore, casting the 64-bit values to 32-bit values won&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// work on large-endian machines.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n = rhsWords &#42; 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> m = (lhsWords &#42; 2) - n;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allocate space for the temporary values we need either on the stack, if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it will fit, or on the heap if it won&#39;t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t SPACE&#91;128&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t &#42;U = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t &#42;Q = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Remainder?4:3)&#42;n+2&#42;m+1 &lt;= 128) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    U = &amp;SPACE&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a> = &amp;SPACE&#91;m+n+1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Q = &amp;SPACE&#91;(m+n+1) + n&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Remainder)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = &amp;SPACE&#91;(m+n+1) + n + (m+n)&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><span class="doxyHighlight">    U = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t&#91;m + n + 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t&#91;n&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Q = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t&#91;m+n&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Remainder)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t&#91;n&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize the dividend</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memset(U, 0, (m+n+1)&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint32&#95;t));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; lhsWords; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t tmp = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    U&#91;i &#42; 2&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(tmp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlight">    U&#91;i &#42; 2 + 1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7b622c469acc130c9a500b85b1473ef3">Hi&#95;32</a>(tmp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  U&#91;m+n&#93; = 0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this extra word is for &quot;spill&quot; in the Knuth algorithm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize the divisor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memset(V, 0, (n)&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint32&#95;t));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; rhsWords; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t tmp = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>&#91;i &#42; 2&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(tmp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>&#91;i &#42; 2 + 1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7b622c469acc130c9a500b85b1473ef3">Hi&#95;32</a>(tmp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// initialize the quotient and remainder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memset(Q, 0, (m+n) &#42; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint32&#95;t));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Remainder)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memset(R, 0, n &#42; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint32&#95;t));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, adjust m and n for the Knuth division. n is the number of words in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the divisor. m is the number of words by which the dividend exceeds the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// divisor (i.e. m+n is the length of the dividend). These sizes must not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contain any zero words or the Knuth algorithm fails.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = n; i &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>&#91;i-1&#93; == 0; i--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    n--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    m++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = m+n; i &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; U&#91;i-1&#93; == 0; i--)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    m--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re left with only a single word for the divisor, Knuth doesn&#39;t work</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so we implement the short division algorithm here. This is much simpler</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and faster because we are certain that we can divide a 64-bit quantity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by a 32-bit quantity at hardware speed and short division is simply a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// series of such operations. This is just like doing short division but we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are using base 2^32 instead of base 10</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(n != 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Divide by zero?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (n == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t divisor = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t remainder = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = m; i &gt;= 0; i--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t partial&#95;dividend = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af54e0572ecf26033ac3fe4513016dfbe">Make&#95;64</a>(remainder, U&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (partial&#95;dividend == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Q&#91;i&#93; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><span class="doxyHighlight">        remainder = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (partial&#95;dividend &lt; divisor) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Q&#91;i&#93; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlight">        remainder = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(partial&#95;dividend);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (partial&#95;dividend == divisor) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Q&#91;i&#93; = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><span class="doxyHighlight">        remainder = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Q&#91;i&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(partial&#95;dividend / divisor);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">        remainder = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(partial&#95;dividend - (Q&#91;i&#93; &#42; divisor));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>&#91;0&#93; = remainder;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we&#39;re ready to invoke the Knuth classical divide algorithm. In this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case n &gt; 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#af4b80b2d90bc4614ea242503aa88df37">KnuthDiv</a>(U, V, Q, R, m, n);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the caller wants the quotient</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Quotient) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; lhsWords; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Quotient&#91;i&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af54e0572ecf26033ac3fe4513016dfbe">Make&#95;64</a>(Q&#91;i&#42;2+1&#93;, Q&#91;i&#42;2&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1531"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the caller wants the remainder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Remainder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; rhsWords; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1535"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Remainder&#91;i&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af54e0572ecf26033ac3fe4513016dfbe">Make&#95;64</a>(R&#91;i&#42;2+1&#93;, R&#91;i&#42;2&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1537"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clean up the memory we allocated.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X % X == 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, deal with the easy case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.isSingleWord()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RHS.U.VAL != 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Divide by zero?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t QuotVal = LHS.U.VAL / RHS.U.VAL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t RemVal = LHS.U.VAL % RHS.U.VAL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Quotient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, QuotVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Remainder = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, RemVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get some size facts about the dividend and divisor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lhsWords = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>(LHS.getActiveBits());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> rhsBits  = RHS.getActiveBits();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> rhsWords = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5fa938f247b20cccc87cc8a6e5d20aa6">getNumWords</a>(rhsBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(rhsWords &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Performing divrem operation by zero ???&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (rhsBits == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Remainder = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X % 1 ===&gt; 0</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhsWords &lt; rhsWords || LHS.ult(RHS)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Remainder = LHS;                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X % Y ===&gt; X, iff X &lt; Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Quotient = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X / Y ===&gt; 0, iff X &lt; Y</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Remainder = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a628da9238224184ed7085b6830c1fcff">APInt</a>(BitWidth, 0);   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X % X ===&gt; 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// change the size. This is necessary if Quotient or Remainder is aliased</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhsWords == 1) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rhsWords is 1 if lhsWords is 1</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t lhsValue = LHS.U.pVal&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This implements a variety of operations on a representation of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arbitrary precision, two&#39;s-complement, bignum integer values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2289"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assumed by lowHalf, highHalf, partMSB and partLSB.  A fairly safe</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and unrestricting assumption.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2292"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APInt::APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> % 2 == 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2293"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Part width must be divisible by 2!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2294"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the integer part with the least significant BITS set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BITS cannot be zero.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2381"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Copy the bit vector of width srcBITS from SRC, starting at bit srcLSB, to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DST, of dstCOUNT parts, such that the bit srcLSB becomes the least</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// significant bit of DST.  All high bits above srcBITS in DST are zero-filled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42;/</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> dstParts = (srcBits + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - 1) / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(dstParts &lt;= dstCount);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> firstSrcPart = srcLSB / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5027d1fc1fcb950cc207e0b39821fd10">tcAssign</a>(dst, src + firstSrcPart, dstParts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2393"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> shift = srcLSB % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a52506c05d3157e52f917679cfa14cf6b">tcShiftRight</a>(dst, dstParts, shift);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2396"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We now have (dstParts &#42; APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD - shift) bits from SRC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in DST.  If this is less that srcBits, append the rest, else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clear the high bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2400"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n = dstParts &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - shift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (n &lt; srcBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> mask = <a href="#ae876a1ecb46543fee1f374dd8c2fad13">lowBitMask</a> (srcBits - n);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2403"><span class="doxyHighlight">    dst&#91;dstParts - 1&#93; |= ((src&#91;firstSrcPart + dstParts&#93; &amp; mask)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2404"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          &lt;&lt; n % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (n &gt; srcBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (srcBits % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2407"><span class="doxyHighlight">      dst&#91;dstParts - 1&#93; &amp;= <a href="#ae876a1ecb46543fee1f374dd8c2fad13">lowBitMask</a> (srcBits % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2408"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2409"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2410"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clear high parts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2411"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (dstParts &lt; dstCount)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    dst&#91;dstParts++&#93; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2413"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2414"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2415"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//// DST += RHS + C where C is zero or one.  Returns the carry flag.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2433"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2434"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function adds a single &quot;word&quot; integer, src, to the multiple</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2450"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DST -= RHS + C where C is zero or one.  Returns the carry flag.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2468"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function subtracts a single &quot;word&quot; (64-bit word), src, from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the multi-word integer array, dst&#91;&#93;, propagating the borrowed 1 value until</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// no further borrowing is needed or it runs out of &quot;words&quot; in dst.  The result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is 1 if &quot;borrowing&quot; exhausted the digits in dst, or 0 if dst was not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2473"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// exhausted. In other words, if src &gt; dst then this function returns 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// otherwise 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2475"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @returns the borrow out of the subtraction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a97a57add297988a66a8d6a81eff19cbb"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">APInt::WordType</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a97a57add297988a66a8d6a81eff19cbb">APInt::tcSubtractPart</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> src,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> parts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; parts; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> Dst = dst&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2480"><span class="doxyHighlight">    dst&#91;i&#93; -= src;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2481"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (src &lt;= Dst)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No need to borrow so exit early.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    src = 1; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have to &quot;borrow 1&quot; from next &quot;word&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2485"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
