<Link id="l02488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2488"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2489"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Negate a bignum in-place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2490" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#abece2572a121bb1dd2c34621c1e13f76"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#abece2572a121bb1dd2c34621c1e13f76">APInt::tcNegate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> parts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a7b409aa866bfa91f29f51fd35bb56003">tcComplement</a>(dst, parts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ac5bc4f0b55d702e1f7e5dea17a097e35">tcIncrement</a>(dst, parts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2493"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2494"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2495"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DST += SRC &#42; MULTIPLIER + CARRY   if add is true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2496"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DST  = SRC &#42; MULTIPLIER + CARRY   if add is false</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2497"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Requires 0 &lt;= DSTPARTS &lt;= SRCPARTS + 1  If DST overlaps SRC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2498"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// they must start at the same point, i.e. DST == SRC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2499"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If DSTPARTS == SRCPARTS + 1 no overflow occurs and zero is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2500"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// returned.  Otherwise DST is filled with the least significant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DSTPARTS parts of the result, and if all of the omitted higher</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2502"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// parts were zero return zero, otherwise overflow occurred and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2503"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// return one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2504" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf3bfaa5ac3f017c8d3b7336d8bd4678"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf3bfaa5ac3f017c8d3b7336d8bd4678">APInt::tcMultiplyPart</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;src,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2505"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> multiplier, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> carry,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2506"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> srcParts, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> dstParts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2507"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> add) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise our writes of DST kill our later reads of SRC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(dst &lt;= src || dst &gt;= src + srcParts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(dstParts &lt;= srcParts + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2511"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// N loops; minimum of dstParts and srcParts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n = std::min(dstParts, srcParts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2514"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;LOW, HIGH&#93; = MULTIPLIER &#42; SRC&#91;i&#93; + DST&#91;i&#93; + CARRY.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This cannot overflow, because:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2518"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (n - 1) &#42; (n - 1) + 2 (n - 1) = (n - 1) &#42; (n + 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2519"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is less than n^2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> srcPart = src&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> low, mid, high;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (multiplier == 0 || srcPart == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2523"><span class="doxyHighlight">      low = carry;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2524"><span class="doxyHighlight">      high = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2525"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2526"><span class="doxyHighlight">      low = <a href="#a17d47a818ea2835a5ad9fee50c239ac1">lowHalf</a>(srcPart) &#42; <a href="#a17d47a818ea2835a5ad9fee50c239ac1">lowHalf</a>(multiplier);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2527"><span class="doxyHighlight">      high = <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(srcPart) &#42; <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(multiplier);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2528"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2529"><span class="doxyHighlight">      mid = <a href="#a17d47a818ea2835a5ad9fee50c239ac1">lowHalf</a>(srcPart) &#42; <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(multiplier);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2530"><span class="doxyHighlight">      high += <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(mid);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2531"><span class="doxyHighlight">      mid &lt;&lt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2532"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (low + mid &lt; low)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2533"><span class="doxyHighlight">        high++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2534"><span class="doxyHighlight">      low += mid;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2535"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2536"><span class="doxyHighlight">      mid = <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(srcPart) &#42; <a href="#a17d47a818ea2835a5ad9fee50c239ac1">lowHalf</a>(multiplier);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2537"><span class="doxyHighlight">      high += <a href="#a74a725ce0eb6c9d51e4c3ddf54b0de8b">highHalf</a>(mid);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2538"><span class="doxyHighlight">      mid &lt;&lt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2539"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (low + mid &lt; low)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2540"><span class="doxyHighlight">        high++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2541"><span class="doxyHighlight">      low += mid;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2542"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2543"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now add carry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2544"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (low + carry &lt; low)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2545"><span class="doxyHighlight">        high++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2546"><span class="doxyHighlight">      low += carry;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2547"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2548"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (add) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2550"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And now DST&#91;i&#93;, and store the new low part there.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2551"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (low + dst&#91;i&#93; &lt; low)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2552"><span class="doxyHighlight">        high++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2553"><span class="doxyHighlight">      dst&#91;i&#93; += low;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2554"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2555"><span class="doxyHighlight">      dst&#91;i&#93; = low;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2556"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2557"><span class="doxyHighlight">    carry = high;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2558"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2559"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (srcParts &lt; dstParts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2561"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Full multiplication, there is no overflow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2562"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(srcParts + 1 == dstParts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    dst&#91;srcParts&#93; = carry;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2566"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2567"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We overflowed if there is carry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (carry)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2570"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2571"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We would overflow if any significant unwritten parts would be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2572"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-zero.  This is true if any remaining src parts are non-zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the multiplier is non-zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2574"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (multiplier)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2575"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = dstParts; i &lt; srcParts; i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2576"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (src&#91;i&#93;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2577"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2578"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We fitted in the narrow destination.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2581"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2582"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2583"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DST = LHS &#42; RHS, where DST has the same width as the operands and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2584"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is filled with the least significant parts of the result.  Returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2585"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// one if overflow occurred, otherwise zero.  DST must be disjoint</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2586"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from both operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2587" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab153d6d2370c0c5526009aaa07cc00e1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab153d6d2370c0c5526009aaa07cc00e1">APInt::tcMultiply</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;lhs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2588"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;rhs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> parts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(dst != lhs &amp;&amp; dst != rhs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2590"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> overflow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2592"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; parts; i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t accumulate on the first iteration so we don&#39;t need to initalize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2595"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dst to 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    overflow |=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2597"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf3bfaa5ac3f017c8d3b7336d8bd4678">tcMultiplyPart</a>(&amp;dst&#91;i&#93;, lhs, rhs&#91;i&#93;, 0, parts, parts - i, i != 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2599"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> overflow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2601"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2602"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DST = LHS &#42; RHS, where DST has width the sum of the widths of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operands. No overflow occurs. DST must be disjoint from both operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2605" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5442d90b169a8cbe8cfcb8724cf79b14"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5442d90b169a8cbe8cfcb8724cf79b14">APInt::tcFullMultiply</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;lhs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2606"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;rhs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lhsParts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2607"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> rhsParts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Put the narrower number on the LHS for less loops below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhsParts &gt; rhsParts)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2610"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5442d90b169a8cbe8cfcb8724cf79b14">tcFullMultiply</a> (dst, rhs, lhs, rhsParts, lhsParts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2611"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2612"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(dst != lhs &amp;&amp; dst != rhs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2613"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2614"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; lhsParts; i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2615"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t accumulate on the first iteration so we don&#39;t need to initalize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2616"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dst to 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2617"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf3bfaa5ac3f017c8d3b7336d8bd4678">tcMultiplyPart</a>(&amp;dst&#91;i&#93;, rhs, lhs&#91;i&#93;, 0, rhsParts, rhsParts + 1, i != 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2618"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2619"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2620"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2621"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If RHS is zero LHS and REMAINDER are left unchanged, return one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2622"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise set LHS to LHS / RHS with the fractional part discarded,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2623"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set REMAINDER to the remainder, return zero.  i.e.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2624"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2625"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   OLD&#95;LHS = RHS &#42; LHS + REMAINDER</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2626"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2627"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SCRATCH is a bignum of the same size as the operands and result for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2628"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use by the routine; its contents need not be initialized and are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2629"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destroyed.  LHS, REMAINDER and SCRATCH must be distinct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2630" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9fbadc3dfac1d405b669b85267421ca5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9fbadc3dfac1d405b669b85267421ca5">APInt::tcDivide</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;lhs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;rhs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2631"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;remainder, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;srhs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2632"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> parts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(lhs != remainder &amp;&amp; lhs != srhs &amp;&amp; remainder != srhs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2634"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> shiftCount = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a9f95a75462af1c1bd3a22cf805da64a0">tcMSB</a>(rhs, parts) + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (shiftCount == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2637"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2638"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  shiftCount = parts &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - shiftCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n = shiftCount / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> mask = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a>) 1 &lt;&lt; (shiftCount % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2642"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5027d1fc1fcb950cc207e0b39821fd10">tcAssign</a>(srhs, rhs, parts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8bd8fe361c9d102eb08cf77f6e4bfda4">tcShiftLeft</a>(srhs, parts, shiftCount);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5027d1fc1fcb950cc207e0b39821fd10">tcAssign</a>(remainder, lhs, parts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a082bdaab3ddeb1d8e28759423242e2d5">tcSet</a>(lhs, 0, parts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2647"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop, subtracting SRHS if REMAINDER is greater and adding that to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// total.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (;;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2651"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> compare = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3dd574e063a1cfeaa96175c5f9c4afa9">tcCompare</a>(remainder, srhs, parts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2652"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (compare &gt;= 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2653"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aba546a206fb7cfbc3cc5fd95a832a653">tcSubtract</a>(remainder, srhs, 0, parts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2654"><span class="doxyHighlight">      lhs&#91;n&#93; |= mask;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2655"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2656"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (shiftCount == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2658"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2659"><span class="doxyHighlight">    shiftCount--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a52506c05d3157e52f917679cfa14cf6b">tcShiftRight</a>(srhs, parts, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((mask &gt;&gt;= 1) == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2662"><span class="doxyHighlight">      mask = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a>) 1 &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2663"><span class="doxyHighlight">      n--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2664"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2666"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2668"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2669"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2670"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Shift a bignum left Count bits in-place. Shifted in bits are zero. There are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2671"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// no restrictions on Count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2672" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8bd8fe361c9d102eb08cf77f6e4bfda4"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8bd8fe361c9d102eb08cf77f6e4bfda4">APInt::tcShiftLeft</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;Dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Words, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t bother performing a no-op shift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2675"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2676"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// WordShift is the inter-part shift; BitShift is the intra-part shift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WordShift = std::min(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>, Words);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BitShift = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2680"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fastpath for moving by whole words.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BitShift == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2683"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::memmove(Dst + WordShift, Dst, (Words - WordShift) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2685"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Words-- &gt; WordShift) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2686"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Dst&#91;Words&#93; = Dst&#91;Words - WordShift&#93; &lt;&lt; BitShift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2687"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Words &gt; WordShift)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Dst&#91;Words&#93; |=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Dst&#91;Words - WordShift - 1&#93; &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - BitShift);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fill in the remainder with 0s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2694"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::memset(Dst, 0, WordShift &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2695"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2696"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Shift a bignum right Count bits in-place. Shifted in bits are zero. There</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are no restrictions on Count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2699" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a52506c05d3157e52f917679cfa14cf6b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a52506c05d3157e52f917679cfa14cf6b">APInt::tcShiftRight</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;Dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Words, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2700"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t bother performing a no-op shift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2701"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2702"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2703"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2704"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// WordShift is the inter-part shift; BitShift is the intra-part shift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WordShift = std::min(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>, Words);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BitShift = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> % <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2708"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WordsToMove = Words - WordShift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fastpath for moving by whole words.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BitShift == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2711"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::memmove(Dst, Dst + WordShift, WordsToMove &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2712"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2713"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i != WordsToMove; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2714"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Dst&#91;i&#93; = Dst&#91;i + WordShift&#93; &gt;&gt; BitShift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2715"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i + 1 != WordsToMove)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2716"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Dst&#91;i&#93; |= Dst&#91;i + WordShift + 1&#93; &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aaf70a90533b469062634730e27f6577d">APINT&#95;BITS&#95;PER&#95;WORD</a> - BitShift);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2717"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2718"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2719"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fill in the remainder with 0s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2721"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::memset(Dst + WordsToMove, 0, WordShift &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a507f18d22ad9ce4dd96e8a664d577bdd">APINT&#95;WORD&#95;SIZE</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2722"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2723"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2724"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Comparison (unsigned) of two bignums.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2725" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3dd574e063a1cfeaa96175c5f9c4afa9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3dd574e063a1cfeaa96175c5f9c4afa9">APInt::tcCompare</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;lhs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a5221357e5b7511cb0c90c94044ba35cf">WordType</a> &#42;rhs,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (parts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2728"><span class="doxyHighlight">    parts--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2729"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhs&#91;parts&#93; != rhs&#91;parts&#93;)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2732"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2733"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2734"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2735"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2736" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#a1c533fb6a26fce38d9cec2b51a7a90b0"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#a1c533fb6a26fce38d9cec2b51a7a90b0">llvm::APIntOps::RoundingUDiv</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2737"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3a0519ef55bfe3d07f8fb2eafb5cdbbd">APInt::Rounding</a> RM) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2738"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently udivrem always rounds down.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2739"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RM) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.udiv(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2743"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3a0519ef55bfe3d07f8fb2eafb5cdbbdafbaedde498cdead4f2780217646e9ba1">APInt::Rounding::UP</a>: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Quo, Rem;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2745"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0f0a665210e453bb16b4bf1861dbdd58">APInt::udivrem</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, Quo, Rem);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2746"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Rem.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a49cd5939942c6665aba4cae8c220dff1">isZero</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2747"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Quo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2748"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Quo + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2755"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3a0519ef55bfe3d07f8fb2eafb5cdbbd">APInt::Rounding</a> RM) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RM) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3a0519ef55bfe3d07f8fb2eafb5cdbbdac4e0e4e3118472beeb2ae75827450f1f">APInt::Rounding::DOWN</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3a0519ef55bfe3d07f8fb2eafb5cdbbdafbaedde498cdead4f2780217646e9ba1">APInt::Rounding::UP</a>: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Quo, Rem;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2760"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a24187c2e178af0df22dac26cd5229294">APInt::sdivrem</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, Quo, Rem);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Rem.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a49cd5939942c6665aba4cae8c220dff1">isZero</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2762"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Quo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This algorithm deals with arbitrary rounding mode used by sdivrem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2764"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to check whether the non-integer part of the mathematical value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2765"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is negative or not. If the non-integer part is negative, we need to round</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2766"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// down from Quo; otherwise, if it&#39;s positive or 0, we return Quo, as it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2767"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already rounded down.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2768"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RM == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3a0519ef55bfe3d07f8fb2eafb5cdbbdac4e0e4e3118472beeb2ae75827450f1f">APInt::Rounding::DOWN</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2769"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Rem.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.isNegative())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2770"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Quo - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2771"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Quo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2772"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2773"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Rem.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.isNegative())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2774"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Quo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2775"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Quo + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently sdiv rounds towards zero.</span></CodeLine>
