<Link id="l02780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2780"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unknown APInt::Rounding enum&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2782"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2783"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2784"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;APInt&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2785" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#ab9e94d7f7d74b11670e87904ed30dc2a"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#ab9e94d7f7d74b11670e87904ed30dc2a">llvm::APIntOps::SolveQuadraticEquationWrap</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2786"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RangeWidth) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2787"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CoeffWidth = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2788"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CoeffWidth == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getBitWidth() &amp;&amp; CoeffWidth == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getBitWidth());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RangeWidth &lt;= CoeffWidth &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2790"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Value range width should be less than coefficient width&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RangeWidth &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Value range bit width should be &gt; 1&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2792"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; &#95;&#95;func&#95;&#95; &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: solving &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;x^2 + &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2794"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;x + &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, rw:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; RangeWidth &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2795"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Identify 0 as a (non)solution immediately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.sextOrTrunc(RangeWidth).isZero()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2798"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; &#95;&#95;func&#95;&#95; &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: zero solution\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2799"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(CoeffWidth, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2801"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2802"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The result of APInt arithmetic has the same bit width as the operands,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so it can actually lose high bits. A product of two n-bit integers needs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2804"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2n-1 bits to represent the full value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The operation done below (on quadratic coefficients) that can produce</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the largest value is the evaluation of the equation during bisection,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which needs 3 times the bitwidth of the coefficient, so the total number</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of required bits is 3n.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2810"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The purpose of this extension is to simulate the set Z of all integers,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where n+1 &gt; n for all n in Z. In Z it makes sense to talk about positive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and negative numbers (not so much in a modulo arithmetic). The method</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used to solve the equation is based on the standard formula for real</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// numbers, and uses the concepts of &quot;positive&quot; and &quot;negative&quot; with their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// usual meanings.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2816"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CoeffWidth &#42;= 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2817"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.sext(CoeffWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2818"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.sext(CoeffWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2819"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.sext(CoeffWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2820"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2821"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make A &gt; 0 for simplicity. Negate cannot overflow at this point because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2822"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the bit width has increased.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.isNegative()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2824"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.negate();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2825"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.negate();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2826"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.negate();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2827"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2828"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2829"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Solving an equation q(x) = 0 with coefficients in modular arithmetic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is really solving a set of equations q(x) = kR for k = 0, 1, 2, ...,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2831"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and R = 2^BitWidth.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since we&#39;re trying not only to find exact solutions, but also values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that &quot;wrap around&quot;, such a set will always have a solution, i.e. an x</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that satisfies at least one of the equations, or such that |q(x)|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2835"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exceeds kR, while |q(x-1)| for the same k does not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2836"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to find a value k, such that Ax^2 + Bx + C = kR will have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2838"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// positive solution n (in the above sense), and also such that the n</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2839"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be the least among all solutions corresponding to k = 0, 1, ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (more precisely, the least element in the set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2841"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#123; n(k) | k is such that a solution n(k) exists &#125;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consider the parabola (over real numbers) that corresponds to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2844"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// quadratic equation. Since A &gt; 0, the arms of the parabola will point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2845"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// up. Picking different values of k will shift it up and down by R.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2846"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2847"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to shift the parabola in such a way as to reduce the problem</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2848"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of solving q(x) = kR to solving shifted&#95;q(x) = 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2849"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (The interesting solutions are the ceilings of the real number</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// solutions.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2851"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> R = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aec662ee6ab1490a4cabebf2812e5b9ca">APInt::getOneBitSet</a>(CoeffWidth, RangeWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2852"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> TwoA = 2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2853"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> SqrB = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PickLow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2855"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RoundUp = &#91;&#93; (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;V, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2857"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.isStrictlyPositive());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2858"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> = V.abs().urem(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2859"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>.isZero())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2860"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2861"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V.isNegative() ? V+<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> : V+(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2862"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2863"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2864"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The vertex of the parabola is at -B/2A, but since A &gt; 0, it&#39;s negative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iff B is positive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.isNonNegative()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2867"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If B &gt;= 0, the vertex it at a negative location (or at 0), so in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2868"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order to have a non-negative solution we need to pick k that makes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2869"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// C-kR negative. To satisfy all the requirements for the solution</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2870"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that we are looking for, it needs to be closest to 0 of all k.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2871"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.srem(R);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2872"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.isStrictlyPositive())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2873"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> -= R;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2874"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pick the greater solution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2875"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PickLow = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2877"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If B &lt; 0, the vertex is at a positive location. For any solution</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2878"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to exist, the discriminant must be non-negative. This means that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2879"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// C-kR &lt;= B^2/4A is a necessary condition for k, i.e. there is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2880"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lower bound on values of k: kR &gt;= C - B^2/4A.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2881"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> LowkR = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> - SqrB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a05d674becc60ba4ef8cd4dd4d38ac27a">udiv</a>(2&#42;TwoA); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// udiv because all values &gt; 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2882"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Round LowkR up (towards +inf) to the nearest kR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LowkR = RoundUp(LowkR, R);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2884"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2885"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there exists k meeting the condition above, and such that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2886"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// C-kR &gt; 0, there will be two positive real number solutions of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2887"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// q(x) = kR. Out of all such values of k, pick the one that makes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// C-kR closest to 0, (i.e. pick maximum k such that C-kR &gt; 0).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2889"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In other words, find maximum k such that LowkR &lt;= kR &lt; C.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2890"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.sgt(LowkR)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2891"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If LowkR &lt; C, then such a k is guaranteed to exist because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2892"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LowkR itself is a multiple of R.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2893"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> -= -RoundUp(-<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, R);      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// C = C - RoundDown(C, R)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2894"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pick the smaller solution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2895"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PickLow = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2896"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2897"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If C-kR &lt; 0 for all potential k&#39;s, it means that one solution</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2898"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be negative, while the other will be positive. The positive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2899"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// solution will shift towards 0 if the parabola is moved up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2900"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pick the kR closest to the lower bound (i.e. make C-kR closest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2901"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to 0, or in other words, out of all parabolas that have solutions,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2902"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pick the one that is the farthest &quot;up&quot;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2903"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since LowkR is itself a multiple of R, simply take C-LowkR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2904"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> -= LowkR;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2905"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pick the greater solution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2906"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PickLow = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2907"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2908"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2909"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; &#95;&#95;func&#95;&#95; &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: updated coefficients &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;x^2 + &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2911"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;x + &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, rw:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; RangeWidth &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2912"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2913"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> = SqrB - 4&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2914"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>.isNonNegative() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Negative discriminant&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2915"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> SQ = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>.sqrt();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2916"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2917"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Q = SQ &#42; SQ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2918"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InexactSQ = Q != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2919"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The calculated SQ may actually be greater than the exact (non-integer)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2920"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value. If that&#39;s the case, decrement SQ to get a value that is lower.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2921"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Q.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3d430216d32f4363e4df154599b98055">sgt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2922"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SQ -= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2923"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2924"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2925"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Rem;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2926"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SQ is rounded down (i.e SQ &#42; SQ &lt;= D), so the roots may be inexact.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2928"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When using the quadratic formula directly, the calculated low root</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2929"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may be greater than the exact one, since we would be subtracting SQ.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To make sure that the calculated root is not greater than the exact</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2931"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one, subtract SQ+1 when calculating the low root (for inexact value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2932"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of SQ).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PickLow)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a24187c2e178af0df22dac26cd5229294">APInt::sdivrem</a>(-<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> - (SQ+InexactSQ), TwoA, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, Rem);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2935"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2936"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a24187c2e178af0df22dac26cd5229294">APInt::sdivrem</a>(-<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> + SQ, TwoA, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, Rem);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2937"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The updated coefficients should be such that the (exact) solution is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2939"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// positive. Since APInt division rounds towards 0, the calculated one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be 0, but cannot be negative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2941"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>.isNonNegative() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Solution should be non-negative&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2942"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InexactSQ &amp;&amp; Rem.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a49cd5939942c6665aba4cae8c220dff1">isZero</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2944"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; &#95;&#95;func&#95;&#95; &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: solution (root): &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2945"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2947"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2948"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((SQ&#42;SQ).sle(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;SQ = |&#95;sqrt(D)&#95;|, so SQ&#42;SQ &lt;= D&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2949"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The exact value of the square root of D should be between SQ and SQ+1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2950"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This implies that the solution should be between that corresponding to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2951"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SQ (i.e. X) and that corresponding to SQ+1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2952"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The calculated X cannot be greater than the exact (real) solution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Actually it must be strictly less than the exact solution, while</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X+1 will be greater than or equal to it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2956"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> VX = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> VY = VX + TwoA&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SignChange =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2960"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VX.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a>() != VY.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6804d9caf15411f55e7b9e9f397f0422">isNegative</a>() || VX.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a49cd5939942c6665aba4cae8c220dff1">isZero</a>() != VY.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a49cd5939942c6665aba4cae8c220dff1">isZero</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the sign did not change between X and X+1, X is not a valid solution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This could happen when the actual (exact) roots don&#39;t have an integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between them, so they would both be contained between X and X+1.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3021"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3022"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// StoreIntToMemory - Fills the StoreBytes bytes of memory starting from Dst</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3023"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// with the integer held in IntVal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3024" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a126453035cc98d97d01233bc532b32aa"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a126453035cc98d97d01233bc532b32aa">llvm::StoreIntToMemory</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;IntVal, uint8&#95;t &#42;Dst,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3025"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StoreBytes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3026"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((IntVal.getBitWidth()+7)/8 &gt;= StoreBytes &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Integer too small!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3027"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;Src = (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;)IntVal.getRawData();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3028"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3029"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a4ee2015697caec796e59972aadc2f9e2">sys::IsLittleEndianHost</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3030"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Little-endian host - the source is ordered from LSB to MSB.  Order the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3031"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination from LSB to MSB: Do a straight copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3032"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(Dst, Src, StoreBytes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3034"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Big-endian host - the source is an array of 64 bit words ordered from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3035"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LSW to MSW.  Each word is ordered from MSB to LSB.  Order the destination</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3036"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from MSB to LSB: Reverse the word order, but not the bytes in a word.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3037"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StoreBytes &gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint64&#95;t)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3038"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StoreBytes -= </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint64&#95;t);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3039"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// May not be aligned so use memcpy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3040"><span class="doxyHighlight">      memcpy(Dst + StoreBytes, Src, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint64&#95;t));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3041"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Src += </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint64&#95;t);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3042"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3043"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3044"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(Dst, Src + </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint64&#95;t) - StoreBytes, StoreBytes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3045"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3046"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3047"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3048"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// LoadIntFromMemory - Loads the integer stored in the LoadBytes bytes starting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3049"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from Src into IntVal, which is assumed to be wide enough and to hold zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3050" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af6d662507305e17aef5ce4361a349ad8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af6d662507305e17aef5ce4361a349ad8">llvm::LoadIntFromMemory</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;IntVal, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;Src,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3051"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoadBytes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3052"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((IntVal.getBitWidth()+7)/8 &gt;= LoadBytes &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Integer too small!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3053"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t &#42;Dst = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint8&#95;t &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3054"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(IntVal.getRawData()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3055"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3056"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a4ee2015697caec796e59972aadc2f9e2">sys::IsLittleEndianHost</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3057"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Little-endian host - the destination must be ordered from LSB to MSB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3058"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The source is ordered from LSB to MSB: Do a straight copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3059"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(Dst, Src, LoadBytes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3060"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3061"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Big-endian - the destination is an array of 64 bit words ordered from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3062"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LSW to MSW.  Each word must be ordered from MSB to LSB.  The source is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3063"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ordered from MSB to LSB: Reverse the word order, but not the bytes in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3064"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a word.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3065"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoadBytes &gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint64&#95;t)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3066"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LoadBytes -= </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint64&#95;t);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3067"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// May not be aligned so use memcpy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3068"><span class="doxyHighlight">      memcpy(Dst, Src + LoadBytes, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint64&#95;t));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3069"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Dst += </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint64&#95;t);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3070"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3071"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3072"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(Dst + </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint64&#95;t) - LoadBytes, Src, LoadBytes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3073"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3074"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3075"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3076" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#ac88b16b78495ecc2a39d8ea2edfac348"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#ac88b16b78495ecc2a39d8ea2edfac348">APIntOps::avgFloorS</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;C1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;C2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3077"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return floor((C1 + C2) / 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3078"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (C1 &amp; C2) + (C1 ^ C2).ashr(1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3080"></CodeLine>
